extendedInfo.description: JobsTrac - Job Dispatch and Mobile Workforce Management. Track and dispatch work to your mobile workforce and field workers. Easy Job Management solution for every business. All in one app to track, schedule and dispatch jobs and track employees time and location !!!JobsTrac job dispatch and job management solution consists of a mobile app for the field resources and a web-application for the office manager or team lead to effectively manage your field workers and operations.JobsTrac provide a complete scheduling, dispatch, messaging and GPS tracking system. The JobsTrac Android application is intended for workers in the field to view, track, edit and complete jobs assigned to them via the JobsTrac scheduling and dispatch website application. Application is best in class of Field Force Manager.JobsTrac is best suited for all industries:>>Cleaning  >>Courier  >>Delivery  >>Electrical  >>IT  >>Marketing  >>Medical  >>Movers  >>Plumbing  and many more for job dispatch and job management.Login with your JobsTrac user name and password and you will see a list of jobs that have been assigned to you. Select a job to mark it as accepted, in progress or completedFEATURES:JobsTrac Mobile App -â¢ See all of your active and inactive jobsâ¢ Update Job Status jobsâ¢ Provide progress reports on jobsâ¢ Track your current location in real time using free GPS / location services on the mobile deviceâ¢ Capture proof : delivery signatures, capturing Images, Videos and Audiosâ¢ Add self generated jobsâ¢ Mark jobs as statusâ¢ Employee can clock in ,clock outâ¢ Works even when out of network coverageâ¢ TimesheetJobsTrac Website - (For Job Dispatch and Management)â¢ Allows team leader/Manager to create and track jobs and assignments â¢ Track field worker locationsâ¢ Check progress reports of jobsâ¢ Communication with the field worker using messaging featureâ¢ Check proof: delivery signatures, capturing Images, Videos and Audiosâ¢ Mark jobs as statusâ¢ Dynamic Forms and fields (Useful for customer survey)â¢ File attachment with the jobs like images,PDF,Doc etc.JobsTrac is easy to use, mobile and web-based, Job scheduling and dispatch system. If you are not currently a JobsTrac customer, you can sign up for a free JobsTrac Trial account at the website linkhttp://account.jobs-trac.com/engb/signup.aspx?Lan=en-gbThis will give you access to our online job dispatch and scheduling system website, and you can create user for Android App from the website.For any technical assistance or feature requests please contact our support team directly. Our support team CAN BE REACHED via email: info@pnestec.com or via phone: 18055043742
